column4: My system won't boot because of an "Upgrade" failure. Can anyone help? I'm booted via Live CD of 10.04. Here's some steps straight from the Ubuntu Help Guide I've taken http://pastebin.com/3dMcChd5 what are these errors?
what were you upgrading from and to, and when/where did it fail?
from 10.04 to LTS 12.??. The failure occured 2/3 through the instillation of the upgrades. Since my syetm won't boot.
